Hartford.Corning Fountain:
Corning Fountain is a fountain with sculpture located in Bushnell Park, Hartford, Connecticut.
The two-tiered fountain was designed by sculptor J. Massey Rhind and dedicated in 1899. It was given to the city by John J. Corning in memory of his father, John Benton Corning (1811–1896), a Hartford businessman who operated a grist mill on the site.
